data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="CreatePasswordNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/CreatePasswordNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="CreatePasswordNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/CreatePasswordNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="minPasswordLength"  name="minPasswordLength"  order="100"  resourceName="minPasswordLength"  syntax="number"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>8</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
